Nancy Jean Shelley ( - 2010) OAM bụ onye Quaker na-ahụ maka udo nke nọchitere anya òtù udo nke Australia na United Nations n'afọ 1982
Ọ bụ ọkà okwu a ma ama n'ọtụtụ nzukọ Australia na nke mba ụwa n'afọ 1980s na afọ 1990s
Shelley natara Medal of the Order of Australia (OAM) n'afọ 1989 maka ọrụ ya. Ọ nwụrụ n'ụbọchị 28 Septemba 2010.
